my brethren, my kinsmen by race

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The Jews are the clue on the beach, the footprint of God.

cognitieve_implicaties: God has passed through history and left evidence
theologische_implicaties: Israel's existence is an objective proof of God's faithfulness
ethische_implicaties: Respect and protection for Jews as 'evidence' of God
onbedoelde_consequenties: Dehumanization of Jews into mere 'signs' or objects for Christian study

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates the source domain by using the Robinson Crusoe literary imagery to refresh the 'sign' metaphor.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully weaves the 'Search' metaphor with the 'Family' metaphor by framing the search as a discovery of one's own heritage and family ties.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Reversal: The searcher (human) becomes the one found (by God).

sterktes.beschrijving: Uses Walker Percy's literary imagery to make the abstract concept of 'election' concrete.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Robinson Crusoe seeing the footprint on the beach.

risicos.beschrijving: The man in the class literalized 'rejection' as physical destruction (Holocaust).
risicos.voorbeeld: The Jews died in the war because God had rejected them.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A post-Holocaust landscape of lament and historical reckoning.
sub_worlds: The 1st Century world of Paul's anguish
The 19th Century world of Alexander McLaren's silence
The fictional world of Robinson Crusoe/Walker Percy

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Emphasizing the 'irrevocable' nature of God's gifts.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Using Paul's 'how much more' logic to show Israel's ongoing role.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the 'Amen' and doxology of the text.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'Footprint/Clue' metaphor, which serves as a cognitive bridge between historical tragedy and theological hope. It relies heavily on relational language (brethren, kinsmen) to ground Paul's anguish in universal human experience.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source by describing the Roman legal process of adoption mentioned in the CMT framework.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: In the Roman world, an adopted son had more secure rights than a biological one.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Connect the 'cost' of the Holocaust to the 'value' of the lesson learned.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If they are clues, they are objects to be used for our search.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Re-emphasize their agency as 'brethren' to avoid objectification.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To show the 'foundation' of the church is Jewish.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using cognitive disruption to challenge toxic theological schemas.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: CMT focuses on how the 'footprint' functions as a cognitive map for history, not just a pretty image.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond the 'experience' of the beach to the 'logic' of the mapping.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher is using the 'Container' schema (in Christ, out of the book) to define identity.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: blot me out of thy book
window into the mind of Christ
appendices.notities: The sermon effectively uses the 'Search' schema to engage a secularized audience (via Walker Percy).
